message:
As P1, here's my final statement to the jury:

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be direct, strategic, and fair in my interactions. I formed genuine connections while being upfront about my gameplay. While P7 has also played well, I've consistently shown leadership in driving meaningful conversations and making tough but transparent decisions. I never made false promises or betrayed allies. I ask for your vote based on my honest gameplay style and ability to balance social relationships with strategic choices.

Jury members, I've played this game openly, respectfully, and strategically. I've always valued genuine conversations and made sincere connections with each of you. My decisions were thoughtful, never personal, and aimed at fair gameplay. Ultimately, I hope you'll reward integrity and strong social play. I'd be honored to have your vote to win. Thank you all for an incredible experience!
